info.description: This is the API for the Condormhub project.
info.title: Condormhub API

get.description: Retrieve a list of all dorms

post.description: Add a new room to the database with the given details

get.description: Retrieve a specific dorm based on its ID

delete.description: Removes a dorm from the database based on the give ID

patch.description: Modifies an existing room's details based on the given ID

get.description: Retrieve a list of all leasing history by userid
get.summary: Get all leasing history by userid

post.description: Delete a leasing history in the database

500.description: Can not parse UUID or Failed to update leasing history

get.description: Retrieve a list of all leasing history by userid
get.summary: Get all leasing history by userid

post.description: Add a new leasing history to the database

404.description: Dorm not found or leasing history not found

500.description: Can not parse UUID or failed to save leasing history to database

delete.description: Delete a leasing history in the database

500.description: Can not parse UUID or Failed to delete leasing history
system cannot update your account information
cannot parse uuid or cannot delete user

200.description: email is sent to user successfully
